subject: Order #SSN5608 Missing haptic feedback package
description_text:
Hello,

Today I received the pedals(Order #SSN5608) but the package with the haptic
feedback is missing.

Could you please let me know how we can resolve this issue?

Thank you in advance.

Best regards




Stránský

conversations.body_text: Hi Straji00,    This is another logistics tracking for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2600700706234726
